Text:
No problem. Glad to be able to help someone as LeonardTSpock and blackcanary and the others here on TPB have helped me.

I am sorry to say that I couldn't find The Superhero Women. If I come across it later I will share it.
Thanks STFmaryville. You're doing a great job.  :)
Just remember that tomorrow when the new Transformers: Regeneration One issue comes out and I have to ask you to post it!  :-)
